pkgmetadata.longdescription: # valclient.py### API wrapper for VALORANT's client API[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/badge/discord-join-7389D8?style=flat&logo=discord)](https://discord.gg/uGuswsZwAT)[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/valclient)](https://pepy.tech/project/valclient)## Installation```pythonpip install valclient```## Example```pythonfrom valclient.client import Clientclient = Client(region="na")client.activate()# get MatchID of latest matchhistory = client.fetch_match_history(queue_id="unrated")print(history["History"][0]["MatchID"])```## DocsCheck out [Techdoodle's awesome documentation](https://github.com/techchrism/valorant-api-docs/tree/trunk/docs)
